articles.title: Hot Stocks | CDSL, Axis Bank, Tata Power can give up to 22% return in short term. Here's why - Moneycontrol
articles.description: On the daily timeframe, CDSL prices have given a breakout from the Rounding Bottom pattern, indicated beginning of trend on the upside. The breakout was confirmed by high volumes.
